problem.markdown: The term ‘analog’ refers to (x) A signal which is continuously varying w.r.t time ( ) A signal which is constant w.r.t time ( ) A signal which is not varying w.r.t time

choicegroup.choice: A signal which is continuously varying w.r.t time
A signal which is constant w.r.t time
A signal which is not varying w.r.t time
